text: The Devil's coach-horse beetle, is a very common beetle in Europe. It is also sometimes called the Cocktail beetle.Wooton. A. , (2000) Spotter's Guide to Bugs and Insects, 3rd ed, London: Usborne Publishing Limited, page 25 It belongs to the family of the rove beetles. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Polyphaga
title: Devil's coach horse beetle
